summary: "Folklore" is Taylor Swift's eighth album, released in 2020 during the COVID-19 pandemic. She made it at home with producers Aaron Dessner and Jack Antonoff. The album is about escapism and nostalgia, telling fictional stories instead of Swift's usual autobiographical songs. It has a calm, indie folk sound with piano and strings. "Folklore" was a big success, topping charts worldwide and winning a Grammy for Album of the Year. It was also praised for its emotional lyrics and was seen as a new, bold direction for Swift.
title: Folklore (Taylor Swift album)
